purchase_complete_step.title: Your order is complete
purchase_complete_step.finish_now_label: A ticket has been assigned to you. To complete your additional ticket details, please click the "Finish Now" button.
purchase_complete_step.my_orders_label:
You may visit the My Orders/Tickets tab in the top right-hand corner of the navigation bar to
 assign/reassign tickets or to complete any required ticket details.
purchase_complete_step.footer_has_ticket_text: If you wish to transfer your assigned ticket, close this window and visit the "My Orders/Tickets" tab in the top navigation bar. For further assistance, please email {supportEmail}
purchase_complete_step.event_will_start_text: The event will start on {date} at {time} {time_zone_label}
